name: Out of Boombox
description:
Boombox is tired, Boombox is fed up, BOOMBOX IS OUT OF CONTROL! Help this peculiar character to run away from his music obsessed owner. HOW TO PLAY

Up Arrow/W : Jump

Left Arrow/A: Turn left

Right Arrow/D: Turn right

Space bar: Shot sonic BOOMS!

Created by: Matrixcore Studio
